entry.string: Administration - Subitems
Overview
What is it?
This module allows you to create and display sub-items for any module item. In the words of the author :

For example, if you want to have a publication type (pubtype) "cooking recipe". This pubtype could be to store the ingredients of the meal, thus there would be required a list of input fields: ingredient1, quantity1, pic1(extended info :-) ) , ingredient2, quantity2, pic2,...

The disadvantage of this is the high number of fields. To ensure that your users aren't going against the limit there... Furthermore all input fields would always be displayed. That is of course not a very nice way to accomplish this.

As I didn't know how to do this better, I had a dream about a module, which can be hooked from any other module and which is able to display / provide editing / etc. subitems to an item. I had a dream about a table, which saves the information, which DD-Object stores the subitems of "module" / "itemtype" combination and another table containing which DD-Itemids belong to "module" / "itemtype" / "itemid" in this DD-Object (1 to n Relation). I had the dream to share my module with the community. Now, the module is here, and all dreams got true. If you didn't get my technical information, don't worry.
How to use it?
Install the module (done by now, as you are seeing this page)
Go to Admin > DynamicData > View Objects >
Create New
There, create a new dynamic data object , which should hold the subitem information.

Go to Dynamic Data > View Objects > Edit [YOUR OBJECT] > Modify Dynamic Properties and add properties (fields). You must have at least one field with a chosen label, Property Type of ItemID, default of 0 and Status of Display Only.
Go to Admin > Subitems module (admin area) > Add link. There, choose the object you have just created, the module and the itemtype that you will attach this property to.
Go to the module Modules > Configure Hooks. Choose the Subitems module and enable the hook for the module /itemtype combination, that you just created the link for
Now it should work (It has been tested with custom pubtypes)
Included Blocks
none
Included Hooks
new/create/modify/update/delete -- Allows you to create/update sub-items
display -- Allows you to display sub-items
